column5: Anyone have a link to where I can download a pic resizer for windows vista?  I used to have one for my old notebook with windows  xp and it was as simple as a right click and resize,but I cant seem to find one that works that easy with vista.    Any help would be great.

Try Irfanview.....its a viewer that has resizing capabilities.  or a full blown graphics program Gimp: http://www.gimp.org/windows/ I don't know if it works with vista. There is a computer section under "extra resources".  for rest
What is the name of the one you had for XP?
You can use Your paint program to resize your pics, Image/Resize/skew options and play around with a old pic to get the hang of the program.
It was micrsoft,I tried it vista with no luck.
Thanks for the help.I will try some of those links..

If you're wanting to resize pics for posting on the internet, join photobucket and it'll automatically resize them for you when you upload.  My microsoft "picture-it" program I used for XP works well with Vista for me.
